attributes.action: Prevent the Incinerator at Trumps Farm, Virginia Water from going ahead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An Incinerator at Virginia Water is probably going to go ahead, unless we do something! It would mean damaging the environment in places such as Chobham Common, Wentworth Estate, Virginia Water Lake and Savill Gardens.

government_responses.details:
Thank you for taking the time to sign this e-petition. As you may be aware, this matter is currently being examined by a Planning Inspector, and as such it would be inappropriate for this office to comment at this point in time. 

Once this examination period has concluded, an updated response will be provided.

You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Prevent the Incinerator at Trumps Farm, Virginia Water from going ahead."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15354.asp

Prime Minister's Office
